data.comment: The match has started at Volkswagen Arena.
Throw-in for Leverkusen in their own half.
In the minute 3, Leverkusen have been awarded a corner by Sven Jablonski.
Leverkusen drives forward and Lucas Alario gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Can Wolfsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leverkusen's half?
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Wolfsburg in the half of Leverkusen.
In Wolfsburg Wolfsburg's Joao Victor is caught offside.
Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Wolfsburg in their own half.
Ball safe as Leverkusen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sven Jablonski awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 8, Sven Jablonski signals a Wolfsburg throw-in in Leverkusen's half.
Wolfsburg's Admir Mehmedi is whistled for offside at Volkswagen Arena.
Leverkusen to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
In the minute 9, Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Leverkusen.
Throw-in for Leverkusen at Volkswagen Arena.
In Wolfsburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 10, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in the half of Leverkusen.
In the minute 15, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
Leverkusen's Lucas Alario gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Wolfsburg defender.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Leverkusen in the half of Wolfsburg.
Throw-in Wolfsburg.
Wolfsburg are pushing forward but Xaver Schlager's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 20, It's a goal kick for the away team in Wolfsburg.
Leverkusen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sven Jablonski signals a Wolfsburg throw-in in Leverkusen's half.
In the minute 22, Leverkusen awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Wolfsburg, Leverkusen push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Leverkusen in their own half.
In the minute 25, Wolfsburg have a goal kick.
Leverkusen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in their own half.
In the minute 27, Free kick Wolfsburg.
Can Wolfsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leverkusen's half?
Throw-in for Leverkusen at Volkswagen Arena.
In the minute 29, Wolfsburg to take a throw-in in Leverkusen territory.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in the half of Leverkusen.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 30, Josip Brekalo of Wolfsburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
Sven Jablonski awards Leverkusen a goal kick.
Throw-in for Leverkusen in the half of Wolfsburg.
In the minute 31, Throw-in Wolfsburg.
Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Sven Jablonski.
In Wolfsburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
John Brooks (Wolfsburg) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Leverkusen goal kick.
In the minute 33, Charles Aranguiz (Leverkusen) has received a yellow card from Sven Jablonski.
In the minute 34, Can Wolfsburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Leverkusen's half?
Sven Jablonski signals a Leverkusen throw-in in Wolfsburg's half.
Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Leverkusen.
In the minute 36, Ball safe as Wolfsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Karim Bellarabi for the away team is judged to be offside.
Sven Jablonski awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 37, Wolfsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in their own half.
Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
In the minute 42, Sven Jablonski awards the away team a throw-in.
Wolfsburg's Wout Weghorst is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Leverkusen in their own half.
In the minute 43, Wolfsburg's Xaver Schlager has been booked in Wolfsburg.
Goal kick for Wolfsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, At Volkswagen Arena, Leverkusen are penalized for being offside.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Leverkusen have a goal kick.
Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Leverkusen in their own half.
Can Leverkusen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolfsburg's half?
In the minute 49, Sven Jablonski awards Leverkusen a goal kick.
Leverkusen to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
Leverkusen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 51, Can Leverkusen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolfsburg's half?
Leverkusen have been awarded a corner by Sven Jablonski.
Leverkusen's Edmond Tapsoba goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 56, Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
Wolfsburg are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Wolfsburg advance rapidly upfield but Sven Jablonski blows for offside.
In the minute 61, Sven Jablonski signals a Leverkusen throw-in in Wolfsburg's half.
Leverkusen push forward at Volkswagen Arena and Florian Wirtz gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Wolfsburg defence.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Wolfsburg.
In the minute 63, Leverkusen to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
In the minute 63, Throw-in Wolfsburg.
Nadiem Amiri is replacing Kerem Demirbay for Leverkusen at Volkswagen Arena.
Peter Bosz is making the team's second substitution at Volkswagen Arena with Patrik Schick replacing Lucas Alario.
Leverkusen pushes forward through Moussa Diaby, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Leverkusen in the half of Wolfsburg.
In the minute 65, Ball safe as Leverkusen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Wolfsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
Wolfsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 69, In Wolfsburg, Josip Brekalo of Wolfsburg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Felix Klaus is on a sub for Jerome Roussillon for Wolfsburg.
Oliver Glasner (Wolfsburg) is making a second substitution, with Paulo Otavio replacing Admir Mehmedi.
In the minute 70, Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Sven Jablonski.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Wolfsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leverkusen's half?
In the minute 71, Leverkusen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leverkusen to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
In the minute 76, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
The away team have replaced Daley Sinkgraven with Wendell. This is the third substitution made today by Peter Bosz.
Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
In the minute 78, Oliver Glasner (Wolfsburg) is making a third substitution, with Yannick Gerhardt replacing Joao Victor.
Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in the half of Leverkusen.
In the minute 81, Free kick Wolfsburg.
Free kick in a good position for Leverkusen!
In Wolfsburg, Patrik Schick (Leverkusen) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 83, Ball goes out of play for a Wolfsburg goal kick.
Goal kick for Leverkusen at Volkswagen Arena.
Throw-in Wolfsburg.
In the minute 85, Peter Bosz is making the team's fourth substitution at Volkswagen Arena with Joel Pohjanpalo replacing Karim Bellarabi.
Julian Baumgartlinger is replacing Florian Wirtz for Leverkusen at Volkswagen Arena.
Free kick for Leverkusen in their own half.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Wolfsburg in their own half.
Ball safe as Wolfsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Leverkusen in the half of Wolfsburg.
In Wolfsburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Leverkusen in their own half.
Throw-in for Leverkusen at Volkswagen Arena.
Free kick Leverkusen.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Wolfsburg.
The match has come to a close in Wolfsburg. The final score is 0-0.
Julian Baumgartlinger (Leverkusen) has received a first yellow card.
